website_summaries.verdict: Commercial-grade chairs that work well for an industrial dining room. An inexpensive choice if you want something a little different.
pros: These stackable chairs are easy to clean and have a modern industrial feel
cons: Sometimes arrive with dings and scratches

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't love these chairs more. They're sturdy and the color is perfect. And a great price!
customer_reviews.author: quinncm

customer_reviews.title: Bolts don't match but still good chair.
customer_reviews.text: They just arrived & where super easy to put together. I'm slightly disappointed they are not exactly as pictured. Instead of being a matching smooth bolt they are basic steel bolt with allen wrench cut out. Would have preferred the more finished look of the smooth bolts but not a deal breaker. The side bars do press a bit on anyone with a wide bottom but again not a deal breaker since we don't spend hours at the dinner table. Over all they appear to be sturdy. Will update if any changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our dining room!
customer_reviews.text: I researched metal bistro chairs quite a bit before I stumbled upon these. Because the price was unbeatable, and the reviews were so great, I decided to give them a try! I just received them today and all I can say is wow! These are beautiful and well made chairs. They arrived quickly, were super easy to assemble, and look perfect in our dining room. We ordered 2 sets of 4 of the black chairs. They have a nice matte finish with a hint of sheen. I saw some reviews saying they arrived with dents, but all 8 of ours arrived perfectly. If you're looking for metal chairs, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Glaeser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a "just for now" set of chairs that was inexpensive until I found the ones I had envisioned. These fit the bill, price wise, and I was pleasantly surprised with the quality! They are sturdy, attractive, and best of all they fit under our small-ish table so well! I'm still on the hunt for the perfect chairs but for now, these are perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Great look, small seat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in polished gunmetal. They look very nice, but are a little darker than the stock photo. They came packaged very well. Chair back is easily attached to the chair base with included screws. No rust on any of mine like some other reviews mentioned. They seem to be well-made and high quality, plus the price is better here than other stores. They can also be stacked together for easy storage. The only downside is the 14x14 seat size. I am able to sit comfortably (for reference I'm 5'7" 125 lbs) but my husband (6'3" 240 lbs) said he isn't at all comfortable sitting on these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chairs to date!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is incredibly sturdy for my desk... so I bought 6 more and replaced my dining table chairs! Great price for what you get! Sturdy... well built... gorgeous color... super stylish modern or farm style look and I am sure it will last for years... I am sure. Couldn’t be more happy!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The chairs themselves are nice. Obviously for the price they work but just be careful you dont lean back too much or put pressure on it because it's not made for that. With that being said one of the two chairs came without hardware. Amazon could only provide a replacement that would take a total of two weeks and I ordered these last minute for a holiday. It's a bummer things were packaged incorrectly and I didn't have much of a choice other than getting my own bolts which did not match the color of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Dull but cute
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but color isn’t as bright and shiny as in pics which was disappointing they’re More dull in color. Scratch easily so be careful putting together. Each chair is 4 screws so it’s easy. They seem quickly painted. Not consistently solid in color but good price. Bought yellow and orange. Not shiny and glossy like table which is sad. But still fun for back porch beach house
customer_reviews.author: Beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this chair. But one thing to consider is that it is a little shorter than I expected and if you have a bigger tooshie than a size 2😂...then it may he a tad uncomfortable bc the metal back wraps around to the sides which makes it a little uncomfortable pressing against your hips. We just added a soft pillow and its just fine...but wanted to share our experience. Aside from that, this chair is super sturdy and we love the metal/wood combo. We use for a desk chair in our home office. Nice industrial touch!😁
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Morse

customer_reviews.title: Cool chairs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, feels sturdy, color is not STARK white but really close. I paired it with a table which has a base that I painted with the glossy white paint used to paint baseboards. It still matches well. The chairs are bistro style, so smaller seats compared to normal dining chairs (which is what I wanted, our dining area is pretty small). The does not technically fit a child’s booster seat (I have the swivel seat thing, not using it yet since I have a newborn though) according to the recommendation in the seats instructions though you might be able to use it still. I’ll be using the built in bench we built instead for that though.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of chairs exactly like these but a different brand (flash furniture). I loved them so I bought these, not realizing these were a different brand. Same price. These chairs came unassembled. Assembling them caused major scratches and I’m not pleased! The first brand as comparison, not only came assembled but welded together creating a much sturdier, stronger chair. They were also painted after being welded (obviously) creating a solid paint job that looks nicer. Considering these are the same price, I’d suggest you go find the better chair.
customer_reviews.author: Just choose kindness

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are so fashionable right now. They give that industrial vibe that is so sought after right now. They're super easy to assemble with the tool included. I've seen these exact chairs at retailers for significantly higher prices. The gray is metallic, so it looks a little more silver than I anticipated, which is fine for my space. The seats are obviously hard because it's a metal chair, but minimalist cushions look great if your booty can't handle the firmness. My husband and I are opening a coffee shop and will be purchasing several more sets (in gunmetal). I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Rose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are quite perfect. We saw the same ones -on sale- for $60 each at a hardware store. We got them here for about $20 each! They arrived on time, packaged nicely, easy to assemble, all hardware included, sturdy and beautiful. They match a farmhouse table we bought perfectly. Could not be happier! We saw similar chairs at a home decor store for $120 per chair! Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't think these could be any better for the price. I searched everywhere for the bronze and did not want to over pay. They are perfect. Exactly what I expected. They aren't very comfortable but I knew that before hand! Great product. Cheapest you'll find! I only needed 3 so I sat one beside my fireplace with a little pillow on it, adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I just got it and this chair is great. Took me 10 mins to put together
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I'm the first to review this. Okay, so the lack of reviews had me a little worried, I'm not going to lie. But I just got it and this chair is great. Took me 10 mins to put together, and not because I'm some sort of construction genius or anything. It literally comes in two pieces -- the bottom, and the top. And you just pop the screws in. The colors great, really sturdy material, exactly as bright as I needed it to be and it even has these little black rubber things on the legs so it doesn't scrape across the floor. Really great for me because I've got hardwood floors. WHOO! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were the perfect amount of rustic and function I needed. I love the wood tops. They are so unique and stackable for my small kitchen when I need to extend the table for extra seating. I was disappointed because one of the rubber feet was a bit deformed but after contacting the seller they promptly sent a new foot that fit just perfect! Great service and super happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary O

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with these chairs. Review after review talks about the wooden seat so that is what I thought I was getting. Even the pictures of other orders show a wooden seat. These are all metal with a very small seat and are pretty short. The color is also not as dark as it showed when I ordered. These are a big disappointment! I ordered 2 sets of 4 and still haven't received my second box so I am wondering if they have the wooden seats or not. Truly disappointed in the appearance considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON BLANKEN

customer_reviews.title: Great farm house chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to transform my kitchen into a farmhouse theme but wanted kid proof chairs. I built my table and planned on buying used chairs to rehab but just didn't have time or energy. This was such a great deal! One of the chairs had a little damage on one of the legs and a missing peg so I reached out to the company via email and they were very responsive. I sent pictures and really just wanted a peg to try to fix it but they sent me another chair for FREE! Highly recommend this set of chairs from this company! Was super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs at a great price. These type of chairs are pretty expensive elsewhere so was pleasantly surprised at the price and quality. Easy to assemble. Easy to clean. Does show greasy kid hand prints easily but its so easy to wipe down. Comes with all the tools to assemble. Legs have built in rubber on the bottom to keep the chairs from scratching or sliding on the floor. Would def buy again. They are just as pictured/described. Shipping was fast right on time! We were given a wide range of delivery date and they came on the first predicted day!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Reasons

customer_reviews.title: Bronze scratches off very easily
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote my review when I was putting the first chair together and got super pissed off when I realized that within 30 seconds I was scratching the finish off the damn chair. I was pretty damn livid. I ordered the chairs with the bronze finish, and it does scratch easily. KEEP THE STYROFOAM ON TO KEEP THE TOP HALF COVERED UNTIL YOU ARE READY TO SCREW THE THIRD AND FOURTH SCREWS IN!!! I learned my lesson the hard way. Luckily the scratches are not very noticeable on the one chair and the chairs are still pretty badass looking. They also feel very sturdy. I’m still giving three stars because of the scratching issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tori and Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 16 of these chairs so I got pretty good at putting them together. I didn't have any screws strip so I started using my drill/driver to speed things up. The first few chairs got scratched on the opposite side from the first screw I put in, so I started putting a piece of the foam between the chair back and the seat while I was putting the first screw in and never had another problem. We've had them for a while now, and wev'e received a lot of compliments. People of all sizes and shapes have sat in them with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JKitch

customer_reviews.title: Part missing
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for over a week for this to arrive, it finally came. Color is PERFECT, but one of the rubber feet that protect the floor is missing. Now I have to wait ANOTHER 10 days for replacement. So disappointed. Will update review regarding Ease of Assembly/Sturdiness/Comfort...well, when I actually get one to put together and sit in. Seems like it'll be fairly easy as it's just attaching the back to the seat (parts attached to X bar under seat). EDIT: received shipping notification that it should now be here in 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: ADawn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these chairs. They were the most affordable I could find in this style. But, they're sturdy, easy to assemble, and they look great in our dining room. I don't find them to be uncomfortable. Actually, I think our old, traditional style dining room chairs were more uncomfortable. I'm happy with our purchase and would recommend these to anyone looking for Tolix-style chairs. They look especially great with a farmhouse style table! They are also great for those with kids. Easy to clean and a booster chair fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I've never written a bad review before but after days of thinking there is no way I can be happy with this purchase. I bought these chairs to replace my beaten up chairs. Well, these chairs came with severals mark, I cant get them off, one chairs back cant put on properly, easily scratchable with your fingernail. Im just disaappointed. I wish the company would reach out and try to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Small sturdy decorative chairs ~
customer_reviews.text: You really have to assemble these quickly. They were packed very well with included allen wrench ~ several in fact ~ but once unpacked you are still screwing metal into metal, and if there is any humidity, get out your wrenches, drivers, and pliers ~ the bottom chair of the pack took some effort on the last bolt ~ and it still is not sitting flush. But I did manage to get the four assembled without scratching the nice finish and only using the included tool. Therefore 4-stars instead of 5. Nice-looking school chairs for all sizes ~
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Russell

customer_reviews.title: In the outdoor furniture section... Packaging says indoor use ONLY.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are really nice, however, they shouldn't be in the outdoor furniture section. They're also not powder coated, they're painted. 3 of the 4 chairs arrived with gouges down the legs and you can see the primer. It's white. I live in the desert and it's dry season, so, I'm just going to seal them with Rustoleum clear before monsoon. They're very sturdy, but very uncomfortable. The seats are so narrow that the side bars cut into everyone's except my 105 lb daughter's butts. Don't buy for the patio unless you're going to weatherseal. Definitely not worth $125.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Jung

customer_reviews.title: Rusted less thatn 1 month after purchased.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are cute. Stylish, lightweight, small, and surprisingly comfortable. However, it's been less than one month since purchased, and they have rusted. I purchased the white colored chairs, and the rust is visible and looks terrible. We planned on storing them indoors over the winter, but to not even hold up for at least 1 month, outside, is ridiculous. They say they are made for outdoors, but buyer beware, these are not outdoors chairs. This was like taking $100 and flushing it down the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! First of all my chairs came in a damaged box that had already been open before and just added a bunch of crumbled tape. On top of it they were packaged to be protected from any damages. They weren’t wrapped in anything! They had black scuff marks on them and even something had spilled on them and were DIRTY!!! I thought these were supposed to be brand new! Also it was CREAM NOT WHITE! I ordered white chairs! The screws were missing and no instructions either! Horrible horrible!!! Now I have to take the time to return them and wait for my refund!!! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kennley

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking chair
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this chair to go with my desk. It works perfect for a standard desk height. The assembly was a bit difficult to do alone because you have to bend the metal a bit, but with a little help it's pretty simple. It's sturdy and did not have a bad smell. The product was boxed nicely and it's nice quality metal.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana V

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the price.  Couple odd issues
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were great for the price. The ship into pieces a base and a back up to must be screwed on. The chairs come with sturdy rubber feet to keep them from scratching wood floors. So far they seem like they will be very sturdy and long lasting. My biggest complaint is that the nuts used to screw the back to the base or not all painted. Some are over painted an allowed to dry which left them with very sharp edges. My second complaint is that the chairs are not stackable without scratching each other up.
customer_reviews.author: Mikebib

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that I understand that these are inexpensive chairs. I knew that going in. I bought similar chairs from a different company at the same price and they were great quality. Unfortunately they did not have gray. These look extremely cheap. The chairs looked like someone painted them in their garage. Paint has chipped off as I unboxed. For two of the chairs I was not able to get the left side bolt for the back rest to go in. This shows poor manufacturing since it was the exact same on both chairs. For one I was able to use brute force to thread it. For the second I was not so lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Reisser

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month of use with a 40 pound child using it once a day and its broken. DO NOT BUY. Waste of money. Back of chair bent and no longer supporting your back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Brenton

customer_reviews.title: Poly and Bark Trattoria Side Chair in Black
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas, I purchased six chairs for my daughter’s kitchen table. They are a perfect height and are comfortable to sit in. Each chair comes with a rubber pad on each leg to ensure the chair doesn’t slide or scratch the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: While these chairs are pretty to look at, they are very small. Both in height and chair seat, they just don't seem to be big enough for adults. We are actually small stature people and felt they somehow sat too low and the backs are too low in relation to the table. So, back they go and we will continue to search! :( **also the metal is VERY soft and just to see if they work, we took 1 chair out to test and it scratched, even leaving the foam on. We simply don't want something that fragile in the kitchen where it will be getting a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Yellow chairs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the yellow chairs after one of the chairs that came with our kitchen table broke. The chairs are a nice vibrant yellow and seem pretty sturdy. I just can't quite seem to accept them as indoor furniture yet. They look more like they belong outside on the patio or something, but that could just be the color clashing with Christmas decor that's still up. We'll see. I definitely would order them again, but kind of wish I'd gone with a white or black (the chairs with our table originally were black metal).
customer_reviews.author: ThenKayWasLike

customer_reviews.title: Wipe clear easily & comfy...have someone help you put them together!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! Farm charm, for sure. I chose this color to compliment our table and light fixture. I think it is a definite win. We have 4 kids, these chairs wipe so easily. We put sliders on the bottom to protect our hardwood floors. I would highly recommend these chairs. The only thing I would recommend is when putting them together, have someone help you hold the back of the chair up as you screw it on. I tried by myself and put a couple knicks on the chair. My husband heard my yells and came to the rescue to help, lol. We will be buying the bar stool types of these when our island is built.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These were such a great find! We were looking for some affordable chairs that would still look good inside and ran across these. They are very easy to assemble (took two people to hold things in place, but not much muscle needed!) and are the perfect size - they aren't the kind of chairs that hit the middle of your back and make it uncomfortable to lean back at all. Completely tied our dining room together, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jheyne

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to put together. Live in an industrial apartment, so it looks great in the space.
customer_reviews.author: AnneOfLyon

customer_reviews.title: A little small for a long sit but perfect for our son's first apartment.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our son's first apartment. I love the look of them and they are very sturdy. Everything about them is wonderful except for one thing. It probably only bothers me but I feel like the actual seat isn't quite big enough. Even if it had another inch it two I think they would be perfect. For him, I guess they are and there's not really a whole lot you can do to hurt them so they should look great for a very long time. It can be stacked away and can take a little beating. Overall, I would call a good value and a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JLES

customer_reviews.title: Great solid chairs.  Awesome Price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. I ordered them for a still shoot and I felt that these are super great quality for the price point. I wish more cafes would invest in them as they are a step up from your regular cafe type chair. I think the bronze color looks very modern and industrial and would work in many different settings I will be buying these in other colorways for future projects.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the set of 4 bronze chairs and loved them so I ordered another set of 2 to ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set of 4 bronze chairs and loved them so I ordered another set of 2 to replace all my dining chairs. I love them and they're sturdy and will likely last a long time, but the finish is NOT the same. The set of four has a dappled almost aged looked to them (which I was in love with) and the set of 2 is an even finish with no dappling and it's a couple shades lighter. I'm disappointed they aren't the same, but I mixed them in with the ones I have and am pretending it was done on purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Calder

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy chairs! Excellent deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these chairs. My first impression is excellent. The came packaged well, with no damage and a parts included. The tool required to assemble the chairs is included. Extremely easy assembly. I put all 4 chairs together in less than 30 mins. They will serve the purpose of extra chairs around the house for the occasion get together. They are slightly smaller than your average dining room table chair, but still seem very sturdy. They seem well-made and pretty heavy duty. I will report back as they get some use. But first impression is EXCELLENT! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great metal chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. I bought it used. Easy to put together and I put a seat cushion on it. Makes a great drafting chair for someone who's on the heavy side. A little rustoleum and I'd make it an outdoor chair. Be nice if it had a headrest or maybe something a little higher on the back. But it's still great. Sturdy and affordable at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Love the chairs but product was shipped damaged
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 4 chairs where scuffed. Product was packaged very well which means that they where damaged before packaging, makes you wounder about quality control. I would have been beyond upset if I purchased these in color as the scuffs would have been beyond noticeable. The reason gave them higher stars is because besides the scuffs they where every easy to put together and are very sturdy. You also are able to stack them which is what I wanted for my very small kitchen space.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs, backs bend though.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these chairs and they were great for about six months. After that time the backs started to bend if anyone would sit in them. The seat of the chair never bended, nor did it ever feel flimsy. We still use these chairs but warn everyone who sits in them not to lean back. UPDATE 11/9/19: All four chair backs are badly bending. Lasted just under 2 years with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: JoshHayes605

customer_reviews.title: Perfecr
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were perfect for my needs I was looking for some chairs that took up less space in my kitchen so that I can move around the table easier. I also wanted to stay within a certain style these were absolutely perfect it took me 30 minutes to Assemble all four of them somebody more skills may have done it faster but honestly no instructions are needed...4 screws, 4 holes duh. Quality is great and they're very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really love these. I was lucky the bronze matched some dining height stools I got off Amazon a few years ago. Easy to assemble but word of caution - be careful when sliding the backs toward the screw holes. The first one or two are easy, but then you really have to pull to hold in place, and can accidentally scratch the frame while doing so. I did this on the first one and was then careful not to do it again. Other than that, quite simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was simple and they accent our new farm table very nicely. The wood is a dead match and we're ...
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot find anything to complain about these. The chairs were well packaged, arrived as described and with all of the tools necessary to assemble them. I now have 4 allen wrenches to add to my collection haha. Assembly was simple and they accent our new farm table very nicely. The wood is a dead match and we're very pleased. I also love that they have little rubber bumpers on the underside so if you stack them they don't mar each others seat! Best priced set I could find and very happy with the buying, delivery, setup and look.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K.

customer_reviews.title: Color Fades!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased chairs in different colors and the orange were the first to fade in color. The red and green chairs also lost their sheen and the color slightly rubbed off when I cleaned it with mild soap and paper towels. They are sturdy chairs and medium comfort if you are planning to sit for a couple of hours. I really liked them when I initially purchased them but was so disappointed when I noticed the fading.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great chairs, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 16 of these before(brown bronze color, too bad they weren't in stock) so i purchased 16 more of the gray ones. I see these chairs in almost every local cafe in NY, and in some famous food places in Seattle WA, so I trust their sturdiness. They look very minamalistic too. These are very affordable and sturdy compared to ikea chairs. +1 from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ou

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I read the reviews and was scared to buy these chairs. 1) supposedly it was difficult to put together. Let me clarify. I was hammered when I put these together (as a woman) I didn’t damage any and it was easy if you have common sense 2) yes the backs of the chairs are distorted. Once you put them together, they even out. 3) big people I am 180 lbs and big hipped. They work fine for me but if you are any bigger you might have issues. Overall, they are perfect for what I need them for. The negative reviews are based on perfectionists. I had no issue and they were packaged perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect! Use as my dining chairs on tile flooring. I have little kids so they’re nice to pull in and out easily. Very light. Very easy to assemble by myself. Have rubber on the bottom so they’re not too noisy or scratch. As far as comfort goes, I read reviews of the metal chairs not being too comfortable so I first bought these with wood on the seats. Big mistake!!!! Way to heavy and super hard to sit on. Wood edges dig into my child’s legs. Definitely get all metal!
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but has a matte finish
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were what I was looking for except they are in a matte finish and not a glossy finish. I wanted them to match my stools I currently own. I’m not sure what brand our stools are, but I wanted them to match. I kept the chairs as the cost is the best. They are versatile for the kitchen and my dining room table when we need more seats. I keep them in the kitchen, because I like the rubber foot protection on my wood floors. I will eventually buy more for our round game room table upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Storey

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! Great looking & Comfortable Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these chairs! They are the perfect satin sheen. I didn’t want glossy and didn’t want matte so I’m thrilled. Just wish they offered single chairs as an option since I need 5. Luckily I found a single chair on the Poly & Bark website but one chair cost half of what I spent on 4 chairs so that’s annoying! But other than that great looking and easy to put together by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Wildberry

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same as other Poly & Bark chairs I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I had to order two packs of these chairs, as I wanted 6 for my dining table, and they only came in packs of 4 or 6. This two pack has two matte finish chairs that are more of an off white. They do not look as good in my opinion, and they do not match my other four chairs. I realize that some people may prefer the matte finish, but I am leaving three stars because that was no where in the description. They are labeled the exact same way, and now I have a set of chairs that do not match.
customer_reviews.author: flores85

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build these chairs. Delivery was quick and the price was better than anything else I found on Amazon and other websites. These chairs are durable and super easy to clean as well. We've had them over a year and we love them as much as day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Poncio

customer_reviews.title: That assembly part, yeah it’s a little tough
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking chairs. Seem to be very sturdy. I can’t give them a better rating because we haven’t used them yet. ASSEMBLY: the 2 back screws are pretty easy to put in. Even though some of the chairs were a little crooked from the manufacture. That issue resolved once screwed in place. As for the side screws. THAT IS A WHOLE DIFFERENT THING! For me, those bad boys were very hard to get screwed in. It was like wrestling a large dog to the bathtub that doesn’t want to go. He won’t bite you. But he sure wants to make you work for it. Wow those were not fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rappe'

customer_reviews.title: -( my 13 yr old is slim and it was perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: Too small :-( my 13 yr old is slim and it was perfect for her. I got them for my dinning table, I honestly do not like the material, I mean for the price I guess its fine, you get what you pay for. But the wood part gave me splinter, so of course not safe for my 2 and 5 yr old. The holes and screws were challenging because its off, you need two people to force it in. Overall they are cute, but I recommend getting all metal. I do not recommend for family.
customer_reviews.author: Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Bad finish - color scrapes off very easily
customer_reviews.text: First off, I had to return my order because the chairs came to me busted up and dented. However, the box was also damaged, so maybe that was partially the carrier's fault too? Besides the damage, I noticed that the finish on the chairs gets scratched up very easily. For that reason, I wouldn't recommend these chairs unless you are going for a beaten/grunge look. I suppose this is a case of "you get what you pay for." I had no problems returning the chairs, wish they would have worked out though.
customer_reviews.author: Pudu

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted! They are perfect! Won’t scratch your hardwood floors and seem well built! I will admit, when you first look at them, it looks as if the holes for the allen wrench screws don’t line up. They do. You need to line up the small arm holes and screw them in just a little bit. Then after that, slowly pull back the back piece and line it up. Then just tighten all the screws! Perfect as ever! Assembly takes less than a minute per chair! (I would recommend having someone help you assemble so that you don’t have to worry about scratching the sides while applying the backs on.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are cute and very easy to put together. You just have to attach the back to the bottom with four screws each! It took about 5-10 minutes per chair. I've sat in dozens of versions of these chairs in cafes, restaurants, etc and they all seem the same - perfectly comfortable and functional. The box arrived a little beat up, but there was no damage to the chairs. I only gave four stars because I was expecting a blood red color, but they are a very matte bright red. I still love them - trendy, stylish and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Very good little chair
customer_reviews.text: I only returned these chairs because I ordered gray, thinking they would be a flat enamel look finish, and the gray color is actually a metallic gray, actually silver to my eye, and that's not what I want, so I am reordering in a different color, they're cute, petite and space saving, probably not the best choice for oversize human bottoms, really like them, though. Dimensions described accurately! Finishing a bit rustic, but can't be beat at price point and for trendy appearance
customer_reviews.author: robin monterosso

customer_reviews.title: Welding slag in threads.
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They're sturdy and are pretty comfortable considering they are metal chairs. My only issues with these were that there was welding slag in some of the screw holes. I had to file off what I could to get the screws in and had to get different screws to fit the ones where the slag got into the threads. I would have returned a chair or two to get ones without this issue, but you have to return all four chairs to replace one. I didn't want to gamble getting one with another issue, so, I opted to just fix it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Faris

customer_reviews.title: Good value chairs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered another 2 of these chairs to add to the set of 4 we purchased in late 2018. The original 4 are still in great shape and our 2 new chairs look just as good. Unfortunately, the new chairs were much more challenging to assemble. The parts did now seem to line up as well and the predrilled holes did not seem to be the right size for the screws. My husband made it work, but things are not fitting together as well as the originals. Hopefully these will hold up as well as the original set.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: You really can't ask for anything better at this price
customer_reviews.text: You really can't ask for anything better at this price. Just know that the chairs are on the smaller side....the smallest I'd ever want to go for a dining table. They were SO EASY to put together! I read some other reviews about it being easy to scratch the metal during the assembly process so I gently pulled the arms apart so they didn't scratch the base of the chair and it worked great. The black is a very nice black that's not super shiny/glossy. Super happy about this purchase! Will add a photo when I'm done refinishing my dining table that they are going with. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Wall

customer_reviews.title: Cute, perfect mix
customer_reviews.text: Chairs seem small for a normal chair.. The actual seat is small, so if you got some booty,,, rethink your purchase. Super trendy and looks great. I added a satin poly to the wood chair tops. They came unfinished. I wanted the same sheen as the refinished table top
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: They were cheap and they look good from far away
customer_reviews.text: These are really lightweight. Assembly wasn't hard; just hard to keep the upper section of the chair from scratching the lower section while you're getting everything tightened. Two out of eight chairs arrived very noticeably dented. Some of the chairs had obvious discolorations where I guess they had been scratched prior to arrival and then were repainted over that spot. Even with those problems, I'd probably buy again. They were cheap and they look good from far away.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, comfortable dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very comfortable. I’m 6’ 1”, 200 lbs, and I fit perfectly in these chairs. I sell furniture for a living and even stock chairs similar to this that a a bit larger and welded, not screwed together. They also retail for about $200 more per chair than these. I needed extra chairs for Christmas and needed an inexpensive alternative. These are nice for the price and perfect for extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. King

customer_reviews.title: Love the chairs/ missing hardware.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these gorgeous, sturdy chairs! The wood really makes them special, HOWEVER, one chair was missing ALL hardware and for the price I really expect to not have to hunt down screws and paint them to match. I contacted the company immediately, they asked for my order number, I sent it and never heard back- even after checking in. If they make this right I will happily update my review!
customer_reviews.author: Catlin

customer_reviews.title: looks great, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with these. the real color is really nice, the color pops. the packaging was very...thoughtful. well wrapped, well padded, well boxed, no damage. putting it together was a breeze. I did it by myself. took about 20 minutes, bc I was on the phone. but could have easily taken 10 minutes. it's basically 2 parts (too, and bottom), and putting them together with 4 screws. easy peazy. oh, and the directions come on the bottom half of the chair. it's super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than what we expected. On the smaller side.
customer_reviews.text: So glad we ordered these chairs. We got 8 and all came in perfect condition,took literally 2mins per chair to assemble. Very sturdy and just so pretty. They are on the smaller side, so be aware before you buy, more like bistro chairs.Also be careful when you put together ,as the parts can scratch the paint easily ,if you aren’t careful. They are metal, so not the most comfortable chair for everyone. We personally find them very comfy and they fit great for our patio table. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.Amoroso

customer_reviews.title: Possibly one of my best amazon buys!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 of them and they are amazing!!! So easy to clean up! We had some wood chairs and the kids sticky hands and food was impossible to scrape off. These wipe clean so easy. They look great and I get a lot of compliments and people want to know where I got them. I love that they stack up too. Make for cleaning the floors easy and storing the extras out of the way. Great quality and am very happy! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: eleasajane711

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 order was fine
customer_reviews.text: We bought two packets of 4 so 8 tottal. The first box of 4 was great the second box was bent , and to assemble and scratched up . Also had different instructions and the color doesn’t match 100% . I’d like a partial refund. Chairs would eventually show wear anyways so not worth replacing but I shouldn’t have to pay full price for half of my order already being bent and beat up.
customer_reviews.author: MnMomma

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Spend the extra money on some better quality chairs.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly, how nice. I opened them and pulled out of box to inspect them. The good news is that they are stable and not wobbly as others had mentioned. The bad news: HORRIBLE PAINT JOB. Looks spray painted and sloppily done. My six year old noticed scratches on them and we had not even started assembling. I am going to repaint them and then clear coat them since I will be pretty irritated every time I look at them and see the scratches. Also the screws barely match the chair. You get what you pay for, I guess. Not happy but learned to not buy furniture online ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Set
customer_reviews.text: I literally took over a month to decide whether I was getting these or another set. These were cheaper in price and for some off reason, the reviews aren't so good. I took a chance and ordered these. I LOVE THEM! If you are second guessing yourself because of the reviews, DON'T I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Bebiana Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely chairs that fit right in with our farmhouse table. I saved some serious $$$ purchasing a warehouse deal and absolutely love how these chairs compliment our space. I did end up getting a few scratches on the chairs during assembly, so do be aware that you need to be careful connecting the backrest to the seat or you risk some scratches. These were packaged extraordinarily well and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are EXACTLY what I was looking for. Super sturdy, clean, goes with the modern theme I have in my dining room. They’re not uncomfortable but they’re metal.. it’s not like you’re sitting on a cloud. They wipe down beautifully. As a Mom of 4, these are a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: let it MelT

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: These are SUPER cute chairs. The paint scratches easily (only reason I’m giving it 4 instead of 5 stars) but they’re sturdy and easy to put together. Took all of five minutes. I thought I was one piece short so I contacted the company- nice staff and they immediately sent me what I thought I was missing and some extra. Yeah- turns out the “missing” piece was in my pocket. Thankfully I found it before I washed my pants!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pox

customer_reviews.title: Buy these chairs...the customer service is eager to please!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. Just what I was looking for. Sturdy yet lightweight. I love the color. The customer service is fantastic. One chair had a few little brown spots on the seat, and one had a screwhole that had a bubble of metal that made me unable to screw the back in properly...The seller promptly and eagerly gave me multiple choices on how to resolve the issue. I love these chairs. You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Chad R. Mclewin

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: **note, We have recently moved in so things aren’t super clean” These are great. I ordered 2 sets of 4. 6 to be used at the dining room table and 2 to be used at the kids homework table. They arrived damage free, and were super easy to assemble. 4 screws to attach the two pieces. Took about 30 minutes to assemble all 8 of them. One is off balance but not a huge issue. They look great, will be easy to wipe clean. I Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Measure carefully and be prepared for frustration
customer_reviews.text: The chair legs turned out to be too wide for the opening between the table legs, but even if the chair had fit properly, this is a difficult chair to assemble. You need four hands and something to protect the metal finish from getting scratched during assembly. I had to send the chairs back by delivering them in the original packaging to a manned Amazon drop off center, far from my home. Major hassle all the way around. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda the lady lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. This color is the bronze. Assembly was a snap, I left the foam on until I was done since other reviews said they scratched easily. My kid even beat on it with an Allen wrench and no scratches. They wanted 80-90 bucks a chair at At Home for these bad boys, so very glad I found them on Amazon at such a great price. They did come with some blemishes and scratches but overall it doesn't really affect me too much. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love how these chairs look with my redwood dining table. They definitely balance out all that heavy wood! For the price, they are perfect!! I highly recommend them! I was worried due to some of the reviews, but none of the chairs came bent and I ordered 2 sets. I would definitely order again from this company!
customer_reviews.author: K. Shuster

customer_reviews.title: Smaller seat as handles Angeles in at base of seat.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look awesome with my table. Light weight so easy for moving. A con of the product is size. My husband is 6 foot 170 pounds and could just fit in seat of chair. We are putting cushions on the seats and when we tried with a pillow there was lots more width as not flat on the seat. I did know from the reviews smaller so prepared. Getting the screws in was tricky as he said "single thread" We didn't have any scratches though. It took him around 15 minutes for all 4 chairs. They look very nice and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - definitely not for moderate to heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a little less than a year ago. They’ve been used pretty lightly and intermittently in a dining room since. They were a bit of a pain to put together because of mediocre manufacturing (holes didn’t line up) but worked well enough. Overall, they accomplished the look I was going for. Several months ago, one of the chair’s back started bending further and further backwards and is now leaning back at a rather comical angle. It’s now sitting in our basement until we figure out what to do with it, rather frustrating but I can’t say I expected much more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Esser

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was frustrating!! The side bars required force to align with the holes to screw them together. Because you use force it’s easy to scratch the other side despite keeping the wrap on. The picture attached shows how the sides naturally align once the back is screwed. You need to pull it to reach the hole all while attempting to insert the screw. Definitely was frustrating for me as I assembled them alone. Chairs are nice once you get through assembling them. They all did come with small dents on all the legs.
customer_reviews.author: P. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are light, easy to assemble, and look great in our dining room with our wood table. They are sturdy and good for people of all sizes. However, when putting them together, they scratched the sides with the nails and there was no way to precent this with the way the directions tell you to assemble the chairs. Would buy again for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Petri

customer_reviews.title: I love how they look and they're somewhat comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love how they look and they're somewhat comfortable. However, they arrived in a box that was falling apart. There was a sharp, rough spot on the backrest. Im going to have to sand it so no one cuts themselves. The chairs were warped in a couple of places. The legs on ALL of them are uneven. ANd it's nearly impossible to put the chair together without scratching it up. The directions say to screw the back in before the sides. I suggest the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Keri G.

customer_reviews.title: Dull but cute
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but color isn’t as bright and shiny as in pics which was disappointing they’re More dull in color. Scratch easily so be careful putting together. Each chair is 4 screws so it’s easy. They seem quickly painted. Not consistently solid in color but good price. Bought yellow and orange. Not shiny and glossy like table which is sad. But still fun for back porch beach house
customer_reviews.author: Beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Decent but NOT perfect!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for 100% perfect, then these are NOT for you! If you’re looking for 80% AND a great deal, then these are for you!! VERY well packaged and EACH chair is imperfect in the same exact way...not sure what to call it? Maybe best to describe it as a paint run?? The front and each side (not the back) each has a tiny blob of misplaced paint that’s noticeable when up close. So 3 stars because they aren’t superior and the packaging, while done well, reaks of a chemical smell-though the chairs do not!
customer_reviews.author: ryan caraway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! A little bummed I had to screw on the backs myself since trying to maneuver everything into place meant I scratched the paint in a few places. This is probably a two person job. I got the white chairs and it’s not a shiny white which I love! More like a matte or satin finish.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE CHAIRS
customer_reviews.text: Truly some CUTE chairs. I love them so much. I got them in the matte black to match my mid-century modern table and they are perfect. They are easy to put together, it only took me about an hour to do all of them by myself. They are also stackable. They are pretty comfortable for being a metal chair, but you could always get cushions if it is a big problem. Love these chairs and will recommend them over and over. Best kept secret on Amazon for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are adorable and fit just right with my farmhouse kitchen. They arrived sooner than expected, were well packaged and without any defects. Assembly was easy, it took me a total of 30 minutes to put together all four chairs on my own and that includes taking all the packaging off. I’ve had these chairs for about a week and they seem to hold up well. They sit rather comfortably and are easy to clean! Amazon had the best price for a set of 4 chairs (I wanted all white) and I highly suggest these chairs if you’re looking for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, but be careful when assembling
customer_reviews.text: Great deal!! Love that these chairs have a high weight capacity and stack. They have rubber stoppers on the bottom of each chair so they dont scratch each other when stacked. They're quite comfortable to sit on, and assembly was very simple. Only true downside is that when putting together, the pieces scratched each other, as finish is really soft. If you leave the foam on as long as possible, this is minimized. Bronze is a little light in my opinion but nothing way off
customer_reviews.author: Smitten794

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs is very nice! They were very easy to assemble. I assembled 4 of these chairs in less than an hour. I ordered the white chairs and they are very white. They are good quality, heavy and sturdy. My husband is very judgmental when it comes to chairs and according to him, he likes the chairs too. The chairs are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware, can’t use
customer_reviews.text: I want to give it 5 stars, but out of the 4 chairs, 2 are missing hardware! So the only option is to either repack and drag it to the post office to ship back, or pay at Home Depot for something that will Hopefully work. There really needs to Be an option to get missing parts...
customer_reviews.author: Kayreen K Gucciardo

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Chairs came damaged with dents and scratches on wood and metal parts. Missing one set of safety plugs for legs too. Chair is wobbly and not all legs touch the floor.
customer_reviews.author: chiyo nukaga

customer_reviews.title: Love 💕 chalk white distressed
customer_reviews.text: I love 💕 my chairs they have a chalk white color perfect for my table I love them so much I will order red distressed ones there light weight easy to clean don’t take up a lot of space the chairs are perfect fit for me I weigh about 145 lb on the other hand my husband weighs about 250 lb its a bit small but works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs that can withstand big behinds!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Better than expected. Easy to assemble and the back angle really makes them comfortable. We are a big family and I have no doubts that these chairs can handle our big back ends for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family chairs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for having kiddos!!!! My one year old was pushing the chairs to the counter and climbing. SO. I got smart and got these. You can stack them all up so that kids can’t push them anywhere lol, and it is amazing for cleaning the floors. Super easy to also wipe off when the kids make a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

product_meta.title: POLY & BARK Trattoria Side Chair in Black (Set of 4)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:Set of 4| Pattern Name:Chair Set of 4Some things never go out of style, and such is the case with our classic Trattoria Side Chair. Perfect for your industrial-inspired dining or living space, this chair delivers endless durability and inviting style. The chair includes non-marking feet caps to protect your flooring and lend stability. Built in powder-coated iron, it’s astoundingly sturdy. Featuring tapering legs and a rounded back frame, this chair is easy to stack and store.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,857 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
